effects.name: Blessing of Kings
effects.description: Increases attack power by 155

effects.name: Blessing of Might
effects.description: Restores 30 mana every 5 seconds

effects.name: Blessing of Wisdom
effects.description: Restores 30 mana every 5 seconds

effects.name: Blessing of Light
effects.description: Increases the effects of Holy Light spells used on the target by up to 400 and the effects of Flash of Light spells used on the target by up to 115.

effects.name: Blessing of Salvation
effects.description: Reduces the amount of all threat generated by 30%

effects.name: Hand of Freedom
effects.description: Places a Hand on the friendly target, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 10 seconds. Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time

effects.name: Hand of Protection
effects.description: A targeted party member is protected from all physical attacks for 10 seconds, but during that time they cannot attack or use physical abilities. Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time. Once protected, the target cannot be made invulnerable by Divine Shield, Divine Protection or Hand of Protection again for 60 seconds

effects.name: Hand of Sacrifice
effects.description: Places a Hand on the party member, transfering 55 damage taken per hit to the caster. Lasts 30 seconds. Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time

effects.name: Seal of Light
effects.description: Grants attacks and spells made against the judged enemy a chance of healing the attacker for 25. If the attacker is at full health, they receive 5% increased healing from this judgement until it successfully heals

effects.name: Seal of Wisdom

effects.name: Seal of the Crusader

effects.name: Divine Intervention
effects.description: The paladin sacrifices himself:herself; to remove the targeted party member from harms way. Enemies will stop attacking the protected party member, who will be immune to all harmful attacks but cannot take any action for 180 seconds
